The United States is being rocked by an explosion of violence and anger.  Crowds have taken over the city of Minneapolis as payback for the death of an unarmed black man at the hands of police.  A state of emergency has been declared and the National Guard is now on the streets trying to seize control.  Just extraordinary scenes to witness and just so much destruction.
At least one person has been shot dead in the widespread mayhem.
